2 Contacting Harlequin Support

2.1 Personal edition

Users of MLWorks Personal edition may find the newsgroups comp.lang.ml and comp.lang.functional useful. The product knowledgebase in the Support area of our website can also be accessed:

http://www.harlequin.com/devtools/ml
